Package Proiect_PS.Controller

Class ControllerUser

java.lang.Object
Proiect_PS.Controller.ControllerUser
@RestController @RequestMapping("/user") public class ControllerUser extends Object
The ControllerUser class manages HTTP operations related to users. This class acts as a controller within the Spring Boot architecture, handling the addition, searching, deletion, and updating of users through the ServiceUser service.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerUser

      public ControllerUser(ServiceUser userService)
      Constructs a ControllerUser. Initializes the controller with a specific user service.
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service used for managing user operations.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/insert") public void addUser(@RequestBody UserData userData)
      Adds a new user to the system. Via the HTTP POST method, this method receives data about a new user and adds them using the user service.
      Parameters:
      userData - The data of the user to be added.

    • findByUser

      @GetMapping("/findUser") public void findByUser(@RequestBody UserData userData)
      Searches for a user in the system. Uses the HTTP GET method to search for a user specified by userData.
      Parameters:
      userData - The user data used for the search.

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public void deleteUser(@RequestBody UserData userData)
      Deletes a user from the system. This method uses the HTTP DELETE method to remove a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userData - The data of the user to be deleted.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/update") public void updateUser(@RequestBody UserData userData)
      Updates an existing user's data. Uses the HTTP PUT method to update the information of a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userData - The new data of the user for updating.
